text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump He is a giant piece of shit that needs to resign.  Wall street success is not main street success.  As evidenced by everyone missing just one paycheck due to #COVID19 (and it continues) Everyone's lives crashed. Wall Street is not the main street reality.
